It has been nine months since the patient's miraculous recovery and relapse,...
...and I am no closer to a diagnosis.
She is physically responsive, her reflexes acute,...
...but her mind seems every day to slip further and further away.
She's become less inclined to communicate...
...and I believe she may be preparing for a more significant retreat.
Tonics and other agents have proven ineffective.
It is perhaps time to consider a more radical course of treatment.
